snippet: HANNING--Geraldine, of NYC, formerly of Delaware, OH, on December 15th, 2015 age 92. Former Broadway and TV Actress. Beloved daughter of the late Maurice and Mary nee Miller. Mass at the Church of St. Mary's, Delaware, OH, Thursday, January 7th at 10am. Interment St. Mary's Catholic Cemetery. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HANNING--Geraldine, of NYC, formerly of Delaware, OH, on December 15th, 2015 age 92. Former Broadway and TV Actress. Beloved daughter of the late Maurice and Mary nee Miller.
